show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content: Today I talk directly to you without a guest about follow up studies showing that children diagnosed with ADHD 35 years... <!--more--> ago have had their lives destroyed as grownups with brain damage and high death rates.   I describe how and why this happens.   I also describe our upcoming April 17-19 conference in East Lansing, Michigan, in the process surveying some of the best going on in our field.
